actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to provide for maximum economic rents applicable to all residents of public housing.

summary.text: Public Housing Family Stability Act - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937, as amended by the Housing and Community Development Act of 1987, to direct public housing agencies to set maximum monthly rents for their tenants.

titles.title: A bill to amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to provide for maximum economic rents applicable to all residents of public housing.
